metadata.title: C.C Criss Cross Ponytail Messy Buns Knit Stretchy Beanie Winter Cap Hat
features: Size: One size fits most - womens and teens
Head measurement: 56 cm, 22 inches, Size 7 to 59 cm, 23 and 1/4 inches, Size 7 and 3/8 inches.
Flat measurement: 8 and 1/2 inches x 8 and 3/4 inches

Occasion: Authentic Original C.C unique elastic stretchy criss cross 3 tier compartment pony bun holder design soft adjustable hat with ponytail messy low high mid bun openings, easy in easy out. US Patent pending for your pony tail in solids, prints, patterns, multi colors and sequins. Easy on easy off, show your pretty hair or messy bun.

Perfect for the cool winter weather warm in the cold climates and comfy cozy fit. Great for commuters riding car, bus, train, power walk, walking the dog, jogging, school, college campus, park, ball games, football stadiums, game day, camping, fishing, hunting, snow, skiing, snowboarding, ice skating, all outdoor activities. Matching scarf and gloves also available. Will compliment any outfit.
description: The original Exclusive C.C Ponytail Criss Cross 3 Tier BeanieTail High or Low Messy Middle Bun Stretchy Knit Beanie Skull Hat Winter Warm Chunky Ribbed Cable Knit Beanie Ski Snow Hat Cap

A must have C.C elastic stretchy criss cross 3 step individual compartment pony tail holder. The original C.C winter chunky slouchy knit thick soft beanie but better, stretchy ponytail 3 holes for your messy bun, easy on and off. Love the beanie but hate having your hair down and no where to put it. This is the solution, rock out a pony tail while keeping your head and ears warm. Stretchy elastic opening to pull your hair through. Perfect for having a bad hair day with a pair of jeans and cute boots. Great comfortable fit for indoor wear as well. Perfect for outdoor activities, or just looking stylish like a fashionista, ideal for Fall and Winter. The Hottest Styles worn by Celebrities for men, ladies and teens. Pair off with your favorite outfit. Will this be your favorite hat? A must have in all colors and patterns and knits. Makes a great gift. Matching infinity scarf and mitten gloves.
